articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Nepali Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Nepali Foreign Ministry Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Nepali Foreign Ministry led by its Secretary Durga Prasad Bhattarai which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
